question.text: You see this sign on the rear of a slow-moving lorry that you want to pass. It is travelling in the middle lane of a three-lane motorway. You should

explanation.text: This sign is found on slow-moving or stationary works vehicles. If you wish to overtake, do so on the left, as indicated. Be aware that there might be workmen in the area.

answer.text: cautiously approach the lorry then pass on either side
follow the lorry until you can leave the motorway
wait on the hard shoulder until the lorry has stopped
approach with care and keep to the left of the lorry
